proposal_metadata.ancillary_data:
q: title: Maple Leafs vs. Lightning, description: In the upcoming NHL game, scheduled for April 9 at 7:00PM ET:
If the Toronto Maple Leafs win, the market will resolve to "Maple Leafs".
If the Tampa Bay Lightning win, the market will resolve to "Lightning".
If the game is postponed, this market will remain open until the game has been completed.
If the game is canceled entirely, with no make-up game, this market will resolve 50-50.
proposal_metadata.resolution_conditions: res_data:p1: 0, p2: 1, p3: 0.5. Where p1 corresponds to Lightning, p2 to Maple Leafs, p3 to unknown/50-50.
